posts.name: Benjamin Broudy
posts.cooked: Hello! We were wondering 1) if we should and 2) how we should / where we should lubricate our rev maxswerve modules. I couldnt seem to find anything on the topic of lubrication on the assembly guide or online. We 3d printed guards that go around it so it doesn’t spray any lubrication out. Is there anything we specifically shouldn’t lubricate? Thank you so much in advance!

posts.name: Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)
posts.cooked: Don’t know the official answer but we did add some.  And have a cover.
posts.display_username: Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)

posts.name: Benjamin Broudy
posts.cooked: Did you use white lithium? Also did you just put it on every single gear interaction in the module?

reply_to_user.name: Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)

posts.name: REV Robotics Co-founder & CEO
posts.cooked: White Lithium grease will be good for this application
